#labels Phase-Implementation
= Introduction =
Here's the list of all tools used to develop nDoctor


= Tools =
 * [http://staruml.sourceforge.net/en/ StarUml] is used for the UML schemas
 * [http://pencil.evolus.vn/en-US/Home.aspx Pencil] to draw the GUI sketches
 * [http://www.nunit.org nUnit] for the unit tests
 * [http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?displaylang=en&id=11877 WPF Ribbon]
 * [http://structuremap.net/structuremap/ StructureMap] to manage dependency injection
 * [http://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/5647a099-77c9-4a49-91c3-94001828e99e?SRC=VSIDE License Header Manager] to manage the headers in the source files.
